name: Version 2.0.0
body: - Change to merge hash fields of custom fields recursively (thanks to @flexoid #118)

name: Version 1.9.1
body: - Fix the compatibility with ActiveSupport features for ver 1.9 (thanks @haines)

name: Version 1.9.0
body:
- Ruby 3 support
- Logger and ChildLogger support add and log method with Ougai extended arguments (thanks @kalmenius)

name: Version 1.8.5
body: - Fix deprecation warning on Ruby 2.7 (by @haines)

name: Version 1.8.4
body: - Use amazing_print instead of awesome_print (by @qortex)

name: Version 1.8.3
body:
- Change Ruby support versions between 2.4 and 2.7
- Update dependencies

name: Version 1.8.2
body:
- Fix broadcast feature if a logging method is called with a block
- Fix that the Readable formatter destroys a data hash

name: Version 1.8.1
body: - Logger.new supports `formatter` argument

name: Version 1.8.0
body:
* Child Logger supports `level` setter.
* Change generating sub-class ChildLogger for each sub-class Logger
* Fix the wrong example for broadcast method

name: Version 1.7.1
body: * Fix warning instance variable not initialized

name: Version 1.7.0
body:
* Optimize performance with applying `frozen_string_literal` (by @skatkov)
* Drop the support of Ruby version lower than 2.3

name: Version 1.6.6
body: * Revive JRuby support with JrJackson instead of Oj

name: Version 1.6.5
body: * Fix the problem that data which is not a `Hash` or cannot respond `to_hash` is not output

name: Version 1.6.4
body:
- Fix formatter to support time upto milliseconds
- Refactor formatters

name: Version 1.6.3
body:
- Add `Ougai::Formatters::Pino` compatible with [pino](https://github.com/pinojs/pino)
- Refactor to unity the `initialize` arguments of `Ougai::Formatters`

name: Version 1.6.1
body:
* Use Oj as JSON generator in Bunyan formatter
    * Converting decendant objects of data by their `as_json`, `to_json` or `to_hash`

name: Version 1.5.8
body: * Fixed formatter#call with data as string

name: Version 1.5.7
body: * Added formatter supports `serialize_backtrace` attribute

name: Version 1.5.6
body:
* Fix that bunyan formatter initialize does not receive arguments
* Be faster

name: Version 1.5.5
body: * Support `child` method with a block (by @eropple)

name: Version 1.5.4
body: * Refactor *Ougai::Formatters::Readable* to be more extendable

name: Version 1.5.3
body: * Fix logging without arguments

name: Version 1.5.2
body:
* *Ougai::Formatters::Base* uses the `datetime_format`
* Fix broadcasting trace logs

name: Version 1.5.0
body: * Support `TRACE` log level , implementing `trace(msg, ex, data)`  and `trace?`

name: Version 1.4.4
body: * Add documents of classes and modules

name: Version 1.4.3
body: - `Formatters::Bunyan` supports `with_newline` attribute whether dump with newline

name: Version 1.4.2
body: - `Formatters::Bunyan` supports `jsonize` attribute whether dump as json

name: Version 1.4.1
body: * Reveal `broadcast` method like `ActiveSupport::Logger.broadcast`

name: Version 1.3.0
body: * Implement `before_log` setter to hook before logging

name: Version 1.2.0
body: * Implement `child` method to create child logger

name: Version 1.1.0
body: - Formatters::Readable constructor supports `excluded_fields` option

name: Version 1.0.0
body: * Implement `with_fields` the fields of which add to all logs

name: Version 0.9.0
body:
- Implement `unknown` log method
- Improve inner logics

name: Version 0.8.0
body:
* Support block
* Support Rails 5.1
* Evaluate log level ahead to skip redundant serialization

name: Version 0.7.4
body: * Fixed the failure to use default hostname that contains UTF-8 chars.

name: Version 0.7.1
body: - Avoid a method name conflict against ActiveSupport on Readable formatter

name: Version 0.7.0
body:
- Support formatter plugins
- Default formatter `Ougai::Formatters::Bunyan` that is compatible with Bunyan
- Add human readble formatter as `Ougai::Formatters::Readable`

name: Version 0.3.0
body:
- Support logging with exception and data
- Add logger.ex_key and logger.ex_trace_indent

name: Version 0.2.0
body:
- Support only a data with msg or logger.default_message
- Add logger.app_name for your progname, its default is the basename of runfile.
- Easily extendable

name: Version 0.1.2
body: - Fix to log only an exception
